BASAVARAJ.D.KHADABADI wrote:

> Hi,
>      When we execute a Junit test case,we get the time of execution of 
> that test.Similarly, I want to know, is there any tool which can help me 
> in finding the  time of execution of individual method in Junit Test Case.

JUnit is not a profiler. There are a number of profilers for Java, both 
free and commercial. Google "Java profiler" for details.
